title: Tahm in Wonderland
body:
The time has come,' the Tahm Kench said,
      To talk of many things:
Of Xin Zhao nerfs — and Kali tweaks —
      Of half-dragons — and queens —
And why magus was reworked —
      And whe'er Riven has wings.' 

This is my response to the [Official Tahm Kench Q&A Response](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/Ts4NEAq5-champion-qa-tahm-kench-the-river-king?show=rundown&comment=009c0000)

Q: Were you ever reminded of the Walrus from Through the Looking Glass/Alice in Wonderland during character developement?

Will Tahm in Wonderland ever be a skin?

A:
> [{quoted}](name=Kindlejack,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=Ts4NEAq5,comment-id=009c0000,timestamp=2015-07-01T19:15:37.489+0000)
>
> I don't know for sure but I think the Walrus did come up a few times.
> 
> As for a Wonderland skin? Could be. Seems like a win :D
